attributes.action: Ensure 'None Resident Parents' who regularly and conscientiously support their children to receive financial recognition of this in the Budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Presently None Resident Parents are 'Single Parents'. Despite this they have to maintain a home for their kids and themselves often on a SINGLE Salary, Good Parents in ths situation receive NO recognition of the added financial burden on them. This makes both their lives & that of their children difficult, NOT LEAST in maintaining a relationship. These are NOT 'Dead Beat' Dads [Or Mum's]

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
